Name: LambdaFunctionVPCConfig
Documentation: VpcConfig is a property of the AWS::Lambda::Function resource that enables to your AWS Lambda (Lambda) function to access resources in a VPC. For more information, see Configuring a Lambda Function to Access Resources in an Amazon VPC in the AWS Lambda Developer Guide.

Parameters.Name: SecurityGroupIds
Parameters.Documentation: A list of one or more security groups IDs in the VPC that includes the resources to which your Lambda function requires access.

Parameters.Name: SubnetIds
Parameters.Documentation: A list of one or more subnet IDs in the VPC that includes the resources to which your Lambda function requires access.
